news_header: Rescue efforts are underway for a 74-year-old van driver trapped in a sinkhole near Tokyo.
news_original_title: Pakettiauton kuljettaja jumissa jo toista päivää maanvajoamassa Japanissa
news_text: In Japan, rescue teams are trying to save a 74-year-old van driver who has been trapped in a sinkhole that formed near Tokyo on Tuesday morning. The sinkhole is reported to be 10 meters wide and at least 5 meters deep. Complicating the rescue efforts are unstable soil conditions, water and gas leaks, and another sinkhole in the vicinity. Although the driver initially communicated with rescuers, contact has since been lost.
